Articles.Content:
This mod adds 3 new ion engines to the game

Download: [removed]

Thruster added

  • The "Dusk" IX-6314, with much lower efficiency, is available earlier in the game. (The radial xenon tank has been moved with it).
  • The "Morning" IX-6316, with double the efficiency for half the thrust, in the same tech box as the "Dawn" IX-6315
  • The "Noon" IX-6318, high thrust and efficiency at the cost of 35ish EC/s, a late-game thruster

Edited May 17, 2015 by DuoDex

Uh, the link just says unauthorized when I try to use it.

Also, I'd advise you to look at the add on posting rules: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87841-Add-on-Posting-Rules-Aug-21st-2014

Also, screenshots?
Link removed pending addition of license, sorry.

Link removed pending addition of license, sorry.

Just food for thought, what if it was assumed as "all rights reserved" pending anything specified? Would that cause less issues or more?
